data.title: Interfaith Chapels and Services at Duke University Hospital
data.meta_description: Sacred spaces on the Duke University Hospital medical campus offer comfort and support, and welcome people of all religious, spiritual and philosophical beliefs
data.text:
Sacred spaces on the Duke University Hospital medical campus offer comfort and support, and welcome people of all religious, spiritual and philosophical beliefs. Please be mindful and respectful of each person's diverse religious practices while sharing and praying in these sacred spaces.

Duke University Hospital Chapel

Located on the 6th floor between patient units 6100 and 6300, the chapel is open 24 hours per day, seven days per week people of all faiths for prayer, meditation and reflection.

Every Friday

Pre - 10:30 am - Bikkur Cholim (page 970-8215 to request Jewish community visit)

1:00 pm - 2:00 pm - Jumu'ah Prayer (contact Br. Mahmood at pager 970-5461)

After 4:30 pm - Family Shabbat (page 970-8215 to reserve chapel for Shabbos)

Every Sunday

3:00 pm - 4:00 pm - Roman Catholic Mass (celebrant, priest chaplain/Fr. Nakireru)

If you are a patient, please plan ahead with your nurse for your transportation to the hospital.

Duke Medicine Pavilion Chapel

Located on the first floor between the Information desk and the Pavilion cafe, the chapel is open 24 hours per day, seven days per week, except during regularly scheduled services and programs. The chapel is also reserved 15 minutes before and after each service. Please help us keep the chapel a sacred space for all who visit. No food or drink is allowed.

Every Tuesday

12:30 pm -1:00 pm - Duke Women Prayer and Meditation

Every Wednesday

Noon - 1:00 pm - Roman Catholic Mass

Every Friday

1:00 pm -1:30 pm - Jumu'ah Service

Televised Religious Services (Hospital TV Channel 50)

Daily

9:00 pm - 10:00 pm - Duke Chapel Catholic Mass

11:00 am - noon - Duke Chapel Protestant Service

Questions?

Please visit the Duke University Hospital interfaith chapel and the Duke Medicine Pavilion interfaith chapel as you wish. If you have questions, please call Pastoral Services at 919-684-3586 (Monday - Friday, 8:00 am - 4:30 pm) or have a staff person page the on-call chaplain at 919-970-8215.

Additional Duke University Programs

Additional religious and spiritual programs available through Duke University include:

The Buddhist Meditation Community

Duke Catholic Center

The Freeman Center for Jewish Life

Duke Hindu Students Association (Facebook group)

Duke Muslim Students Association

Duke University Chapel
